Pucchantā nipuṇe pañhe, buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamuṃ.
content.gatha1: Tesaṃ buddho pabyākāsi, pañhe puṭṭho yathātathaṃ;
content.gathalast: Pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇena, tosesi brāhmaṇe muni.
Brahmacariyamacariṃsu, varapaññassa santike.
Tathā yo paṭipajjeyya, gacche pāraṃ apārato.
Maggo so pāraṃ gamanāya, tasmā pārāyanaṃ iti.
Nikkāmo nibbanonibbuto nāgo, kissa hetu musā bhaṇe.
Handāhaṃ kittayissāmi, giraṃ vaṇṇūpasañhitaṃ.
Anāsavo sabbadukkhapahīno, saccavhayo brahme upāsito me.
Evaṃ pahaṃ appadasse pahāya, mahodadhiṃ haṃsoriva ajjhapatto.
Sabbaṃ taṃ itihitihaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhanaṃ.
Gotamo bhūripaññāṇo, gotamo bhūrimedhaso.
Taṇhakkhayamanītikaṃ , yassa natthi upamā kvaci’’.

Gotamā bhūripaññāṇā, gotamā bhūrimedhasā.
Taṇhakkhayamanītikaṃ, yassa natthi upamā kvaci.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāva, rattindivaṃ brāhmaṇa appamatto;
content.gathalast: Namassamāno vivasemi rattiṃ, teneva maññāmi avippavāsaṃ.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca, nāpenti me gotamasāsanamhā;
content.gathalast: Yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ vajati bhūripañño, sa tena teneva natohamasmi.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Jiṇṇassa me dubbalathāmakassa, teneva kāyo na paleti tattha;
content.gathalast: Saṃkappayantāyasaṃkappayattāya vajāmi niccaṃ, mano hi me brāhmaṇa tena yutto.
Athaddasāsiṃ sambuddhaṃ, oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṃ’’.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Yathā ahū vakkali muttasaddho, bhadrāvudho āḷavi gotamo ca;
content.gathalast: Gamissasi tvaṃ piṅgiya maccudheyyassa pāraṃmaccudheyyapāraṃ’’ .
Vivaṭṭacchado sambuddho, akhilo paṭibhānavā.
content.gatha1: ‘‘Adhideve abhiññāya, sabbaṃ vedi varovaraṃparo varaṃparo varaṃparo paraṃ ;
content.gathalast: Pañhānantakaro satthā, kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānataṃ.
Addhā gamissāmi na mettha kaṅkhā, evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta’’nti.
content.gatha1: Urago imā uddānagāthāyo sī. pī. potthakesu na santi dhaniyopi ca, khaggavisāṇo kasi ca;
content.gatha2: Cundo bhavo punadeva, vasalo ca karaṇīyañca;
content.gathalast: Hemavato atha yakkho, vijayasuttaṃ munisuttavaranti.
Desito cakkhumatā vimalena, suyyati vaggavaro uragoti.
Nāvānātha kiṃsīlauṭṭhahano ca, rāhulo ca punapi vaṅgīso.
Cuddasasuttadharo dutiyamhi, cūḷakavaggavaroti tamāhu.
Sabhiyaṃ keṇiyameva sallanāmo, vāseṭṭhavaro kālikopi ca.
content.gatha1: Nālakasuttavaro suvibhatto, taṃ anupassī tathā punadeva;
content.gathalast: Dvādasasuttadharo tatiyamhi, suyyati vaggavaro mahānāmo.
Jarā mettiyavaro suvibhatto, pasūramāgaṇḍiyā purābhedo.
Soḷasasuttadharo catutthamhi, aṭṭhakavaggavaroti tamāhu.
Pāsāṇakacetiyavare suvibhatte, vasi bhagavā gaṇaseṭṭho.
content.gatha1: Ubhayavāsamāgatiyamhiubhayaṃ vā puṇṇasamāgataṃ yamhi , dvādasayojaniyā parisāya;
content.gathalast: Nippakāsayi dhammamadāsi.
Sabbakilesapamocanahetuṃ, desayi suttavaraṃ dvipadaggo.

content.gatha1: Rāgamale amalaṃ vimalaggaṃ, dosamale amalaṃ vimalaggaṃ;
content.gathalast: Desayi suttavaraṃ dvipadaggo.
content.gatha1: Klesamale amalaṃ vimalaggaṃ, duccaritamale amalaṃ vimalaggaṃ;
content.gathalast: Lokavicāraṇañāṇapabhaggaṃ, desayi suttavaraṃ dvipadaggo.

Tassa sunibbutadassanahetuṃ, desayi suttavaraṃ dvipadaggoti.
